name: Fit Where You Are Confortable
description:
Hey guys, this is my entry for the Game Jam " Pencil, Chisel, Code ! ", my first Game Jam o_o , I made this game in probably 12h max of work.

I know that is a little buggy but it is what I could make in the given time, can't work more in the project because University.

Enjoy the game and thank You! only 5 levels sorry :'(  

The art was all made by me, yeah I know horrible xd 

The sounds are from Freeound, and the Font from daFont.
